text:
Hey HN!

For many years we have relied on the candid feedback of users like yourself to ensure that we set the bar high for webpack.

Whether it's been positive or negative, it has helped impact the future and direction of our project because it is you all who represents us.

On behalf of the rest of the core team, we'd like you to take 2-3 min to fill out our user survey:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc-qZE3nrvCDzHAIyVrNveQpqR7mkbyNoXAqPksx-HvEepgjg/viewform?usp=sf_link

And as always thank you infinitely for the support, criticism, love and feedback you have shown our project. Of course once we have webpack.js.org/vote back up and running we will continue to leverage this as our transparent means for impacting our direction.

- Sean (@TheLarkInn) webpack core team
title: Webpack user survey from core team
